extendedInfo.description: Dress up for the Christmas Holidays! Be the talk of the town this winter? Nutty Apps presents âWinter Dress Upâ - your chance to dress up your own avatar for your skiing holiday. All the socialites are coming to the mountain resort lodge, so dress-up right and score a chance at being noticed by everyone this winter.Unleash the young fashion designer in you. Get ready to dress up this ultimately popular cheer leader avatar from her huge selection of clothes and accessories in your Android Wardrobe! Easy to play â fun for all gameplay for all girls -Guaranteed to make you go gaga!And if you think youâve made something super awesome, then share it creation with friends on Facebook .Go over multiple items for dressing-up the most amazing girl in town! Make something that will make your friends and family surprised.This winter explore new possibilities in dressing up without spending any time or money in the fashion mall. Make your avatar girl extra special! Create, dressup and decorate your very own girl with lots of clothes and accessories â as many as you want, anywhere you want! âWinter Dress Upâ includes a free small sample of wardrobe items. Also includes hundreds of wardrobe items as part of the in-game Store. Go to the Store inside âWinter Dress Upâ to purchase these items INSTANTLY and gain access to the new items!Here is your chance to walk down the fashion runway- be the star of the show- catch everyoneâs attention on your at the ramp. Donât miss it! ===== FEATURES ===== - Completely customize your own avatar- from head to toe- creativity and freedom unlimited- Time Attack Mode: Dress-up a model within the time-frame to win $ points. [COMING SOON]- In-game store containing multiple items to add to your wardrobe - Top accessories and apparels from big names in the fashion industry- Special dressing items to keep you warm this winter- Over +1,000,000 different dress ups possible- New updates in the coming days to add extra features============================================================PRIVACY POLICY:As a designer of kidsâ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: www.nuttyapps.com/privacypolicy.IN-APP PURCHASES:Â This app lets you purchase digital content using actual money. On Google Wallet, you can configure parental controls to avoid unintentional purchases.NEED HELP?Contact us with any questions or comments: nuttyfeedback@gmail.com============================================================DISCLAIMER:All BGMs are the property of Kevin MacLeod.
